Hi, I'm Nicolas Garcia Belmonte. I visualize data. Here's some of my work.

Data Visualizations

Software

  • deck.gl - WebGL Visualization Layers by Uber's Visualization Team
  • Multilevel Agglomerative Edge Bundling - JavaScript implementation of the MINGLE edge bundling algorithm (with extensions)
  • Line Integral Convolution - JavaScript WebGL implementation of Line Integral Convolution techniques to visualize vector fields
  • PhiloGL - A WebGL Framework for advanced data visualization, creative coding and game development.
  • V8-GL: Desktop hardware accelerated graphics with JavaScript - Before WebGL existed I added bindings to V8 to expose the OpenGL API in Chrome.
  • JavaScript InfoVis Toolkit - Create Web Standards based interactive data visualizations.
